title: Electoral vote cartogram
description: The major news outlets all have electoral vote cartograms, but I appreciate Bloomberg’s…Tags: Bloomberg, election
author: Nathan Yau
excerpt: The major news outlets all have electoral vote cartograms, but I appreciate Bloomberg’s version that is extra Tetris-like. I think it’s the spacing and extra thin grid lines.
text: The major news outlets all have electoral vote cartograms, but I appreciate Bloomberg’s version that is extra Tetris-like. I think it’s the spacing and extra thin grid lines.
